price: Maka rasailah olehmu (siksa ini) disebabkan kamu melupakan akan pertemuan dengan harimu ini (hari kiamat).  Sesungguhnya Kami telah melupakan kamu (pula) dan rasakanlah siksa yang kekal disebabkan apa yang selalu kamu kerjakan".
arabic: فَذُوقُواْ بِمَا نَسِيتُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَآ إِنَّا نَسِينَٰكُمۡۖ وَذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fadhūqū bimā nasītum liqāa yawmikum hādhā innā nasīnākum wadhūqū ʿadhāba al-khul'di bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
